text: P. Suresh, Associate Professor in Department of Zoology, Thiagarajar College, who has been working on the Indian Arthropods over the last 25 years and successfully completed many research projects funded by Government of India, was conferred fellowship of Applied Zoologists Research Association (AZRA) award – 2015 at a conference held in Cuttack recently for his outstanding research contributions in the field of Arthropods molecular phylogenetics based on DNA sequence information, a press release said here on Monday.
title: Fellowship awarded
